auto.modes

Class AutoModeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • auto.modes.AutoModeBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoNothingMode

    public abstract class AutoModeBase
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class that is the basis of the robot's autonomous routines. This is implemented in auto.modes (which are routines that do actions). Inspired by 254 The Cheesy Poofs
    Author:
    Trevor
